医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示长达一年的大重量阻力训练对腿部重要力量的影响一项临床试验的后续结果显示了一项临床试验的后续结果，该试验在线发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open Sport & Movement Medicine 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-effects-of-year-long-heavy-resistance-training-on-vital-leg-strength.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-effects-of-year-long-heavy-resistance-training-on-vital-leg-strength.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5109ae3d-09e1-4e46-812d-c89d3f98c416 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 10:13:07 -0400 Study shows effects of year-long heavy resistance training on vital leg strength
紧缩政策导致英国预期寿命下降近半年伦敦政治经济学院 (LSE) 今天（6 月 19 日星期三）发布的一份新工作论文显示，2010 年至 2019 年间，政府的紧缩开支削减导致英国普通人的预期寿命缩短了近半年国际不平等研究所，由伦敦经济学院和伦敦国王学院的研究人员撰写。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Austerity-linked-to-nearly-half-year-drop-in-life-expectancy-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Austerity-linked-to-nearly-half-year-drop-in-life-expectancy-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27ef934-21d8-474e-acb3-b8e223b43ed3 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 10:06:36 -0400 Austerity linked to nearly half-year drop in life expectancy in the UK
解锁 B 细胞在视神经脊髓炎谱系障碍治疗中的作用自身免疫性疾病目前无法治愈，只能治疗，影响中枢神经系统的视神经脊髓炎谱系疾病也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Unlocking-the-role-of-B-cells-in-neuromyelitis-optica-spectrum-disorder-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Unlocking-the-role-of-B-cells-in-neuromyelitis-optica-spectrum-disorder-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb2e1df1-29d3-496f-a316-69eaacb173bb Wed, 19 Jun 2024 09:47:00 -0400 Unlocking the role of B cells in neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder treatment

城市发展影响老龄化人口的健康随着时间的推移，其独特的城市增长轨迹对其老龄居民健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Urban-development-impacts-health-of-aging-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Urban-development-impacts-health-of-aging-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54d6cdae-5b20-419a-a356-2258e853010f Wed, 19 Jun 2024 08:13:00 -0400 Urban development impacts health of aging populations
个性化大脑回路评分定义六种抑郁和焦虑生物型研究人员利用脑回路功能的功能磁共振成像数据，为焦虑和抑郁患者得出可解释的、个性化的脑回路功能障碍评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Personalized-brain- Circuit-scores-define-six-depression-and-anxiety-biotypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Personalized-brain- Circuit-scores-define-six-depression-and-anxiety-biotypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92595a74-b9f1-4a74-b491-74c78b49d7d0 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 07:31:00 -0400 Personalized brain circuit scores define six depression and anxiety biotypes
先天性黑素细胞痣的因果变异靶向核糖核酸治疗针对先天性黑素细胞痣中致病性 NRAS c.181C>;A 突变的基因治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Causal-variant-targeted-ribonucleic-acid-treatment-for-congenital-melanocytic-nevi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Causal-variant-targeted-ribonucleic-acid-treatment-for-congenital-melanocytic-nevi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adbcbfc7-c856-4625-b2e2-23e091c4363e Wed, 19 Jun 2024 07:02:00 -0400 Causal variant-targeted ribonucleic acid treatment for congenital melanocytic nevi
报告显示，四分之一的父母表示，他们的孩子因为担心或焦虑而无法入睡研究结果表明，虽然大多数父母为孩子制定了就寝时间，但许多孩子在就寝时会感到焦虑或不安，五分之一的孩子服用褪黑激素来帮助他们入睡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/1-in-4-parents-say-their-young-child-cane28099t-go-to-sleep-because-of-being-worried-or-焦虑报告揭示.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/1-in-4-parents-say-their-young-child-cane28099t-go-to-sleep-because-of-being-worried-or-焦虑报告揭示.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3ff7a5b-74e5-4a8b-9d75-d771ca45c6a9 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 06:47:00 -0400 1 in 4 parents say their young child can’t go to sleep because of being worried or anxious, report reveals
TOMI环境解决方案支持合作伙伴和客户抗击全球禽流感（H5N1）禽流感疫情TOMI Environmental Solutions, Inc.®（“TOMI”）是一家专门从事消毒和净化业务的全球性公司，通过其 SteraMist 品牌产品利用其一流的二元电离技术 (BIT) 平台，今天宣布该公司正在与客户和合作伙伴密切合作支持抗击目前在全球范围内造成广泛破坏的禽流感（H5N1）爆发的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/TOMI-Environmental-Solutions-supports-partners-and-customers-to-combat-global-avian-influenza-(H5N1)-bird-flu-outbreak。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/TOMI-Environmental-Solutions-supports-partners-and-customers-to-combat-global-avian-influenza-(H5N1)-bird-flu-outbreak。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe20d046-214d-48b6-af20-08623a0f675f Wed, 19 Jun 2024 04:37:00 -0400 TOMI Environmental Solutions supports partners and customers to combat global avian influenza (H5N1) bird flu outbreak
第四频道《超级外科医生：生命的机会》新一季回归Wonderhood 的《超级外科医生：生命的机会》系列第二季将于 6 月 18 日播出，让观众独家了解世界领先的综合癌症中心皇家马斯登 NHS 基金会信托基金的幕后花絮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Super-Surgeons-A-Chance-at-Life-returns-with-new-season-on-Channel-4.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Super-Surgeons-A-Chance-at-Life-returns-with-new-season-on-Channel-4.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f2d779d-9628-42a7-92b5-565ae5b89b71 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:58:00 -0400 Super Surgeons: A Chance at Life returns with new season on Channel 4
